700148f-a.title: Bronx: 151st Street (East) - Gerard Avenue
700148f-a.text:
East 151st Street, east from Gerard Ave., to Grand Concourse. The
7-story apartment house, in the center is No. 175, at the N.E. corner of
Walton Ave.
april 30, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.

701105f-a.title: Bronx: Gerard Avenue - 151st Street (East)
701105f-a.text:
Gerard Ave., north from and including East 151st Street.
April 3o, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
